Services.title: SERVICES
Services.subtitle: What we do
Services.webDevDesc: Custom websites and web applications with cutting-edge technology. React, Next.js, full-stack.
Services.aiDesc: AI integrations, chatbots, and business process automation powered by machine learning.
Services.mobileDesc: Native and hybrid applications for iOS and Android with native performance.
Services.cloudDesc: Cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, containers and automated deployments.
Services.customDesc: Tailored software solutions for specific business needs and workflows.

Portfolio.subtitle: Real work
Portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
Portfolio.project1Desc: Virtual gymkhana SaaS platform. Create interactive challenges with tests, timers and access codes to gift unique experiences.
Portfolio.project1Tech: Next.js · React · TypeScript · Tailwind · Auth · DB
Portfolio.project2Desc: Professional website for a sports physiotherapy clinic. Elegant design with booking system, detailed services and optimized SEO.

Process.title: PROCESS
Process.subtitle: How we work
Process.step1Desc: Tell us about your idea or need. Response within 24 hours.
Process.step2Desc: We understand your project in detail: goals, users and technical requirements.
Process.step3Desc: Scope, technologies, timelines and fixed budget. No surprises.
Process.step4Desc: Sprints with functional deliveries every 1-2 weeks. You see progress in real time.
Process.step5Desc: Production deployment, training and ongoing support included.

Team.subtitle: Tyrell Files
Team.title: TEAM
Team.bio: Full-stack developer with AI as copilot. Every project is a challenge and AI multiplies what I can build.
Team.quote: "All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain."

FAQ.q1: How much does custom web or app development cost?
FAQ.a1: Every project is unique. We provide a fixed-price quote with no obligation after analyzing your needs. Web projects typically start from €2,000 and apps from €5,000.
FAQ.q2: How long does it take to complete a project?
FAQ.a2: It depends on complexity: a corporate website can be ready in 2-4 weeks, a full web application in 1-3 months. We deliver functional updates every 1-2 weeks so you can track progress.
FAQ.q3: Do you work with artificial intelligence?
FAQ.a3: Yes, we integrate AI into existing and new projects: chatbots, process automation, data analysis, content generation and more. We use OpenAI, Anthropic APIs and open source models.
FAQ.q4: Do you offer maintenance and support after launch?
FAQ.a4: Yes, all our projects include post-launch support. We offer monthly maintenance plans covering updates, bug fixes and continuous improvements.
FAQ.q5: What technologies do you work with?
FAQ.a5: Mainly React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Java/Spring Boot, Python, and cloud with AWS/GCP. We choose the technology that best fits each project.
FAQ.q6: Do you only work in Zaragoza or also remotely?
FAQ.a6: We work with clients across Spain and Europe. Our process is 100% digital: video call meetings, online deliveries and seamless communication regardless of location.

Footer.description: Next generation software. Websites, apps, and systems that make a difference.
